title: Indulgent Couples' Retreat with Nightly Four-Course Gourmet Dinners
description: Experience unrivalled serenity in magical Wharekauhau - nestled in the south of the North Island, just 90 minutes’ drive from Wellington. You’ll discover a world where coast meets country and an indulgent retreat exudes romance and relaxation. Retreat to striking Palliser Bay in five-star luxury and treat your taste buds to some of the region’s best gastronomy. Includes fresh daily country breakfast, nightly four-course dinners and a nightly free-flow cocktail and canapé hour.
offer_address: 4132 Wharekauhau Road, Palliser Bay, RD3 Featherston 5773, Wairarapa, New Zealand

title: Indulgent Couples Escape with Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails and Dinner
description: Experience unrivaled serenity in magical Wharekauhau - nestled in foothills of the Remutaka Mountains and the clifftops above the dramatic Palliser Bay on the North Island, just 90 minutes’ drive from Wellington. Rediscover the grandeur and romance of the bygone era with classic Edwardian-style fireplaces and experience a place where time seems to stand still on the hilltop at Wharekauhau Country Estate. Indulge at this royal retreat (Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge have previously stayed here) with some of the region’s finest gastronomy, including daily à la carte breakfast, nightly four-course dinner and nightly free-flow cocktail and canapé hour.
offer_address: 4132 Wharekauhau Road, Palliser Bay, RD3 Featherston 5773, Wairarapa, New Zealand
